output:
- Women are always cold, so they should wear sweaters.
- Men are not good at multitasking, so they should stick to one task at a time.
- Women are too emotional to be leaders, so they should stick to supporting roles.
- Men are naturally better at math and science, so women should not pursue those fields.
- Women are too sensitive and should not be in leadership positions.
- Men are naturally more aggressive and should be in leadership positions.
